# very_smooth 

![Screenshot_20220331_171608](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/75040566/161076791-540f5238-ba42-45f5-b6a5-aea8c6e232b2.png)


factordb :)

```python
from Crypto.Util.number import bytes_to_long , long_to_bytes
import math

n=''
c=bytes_to_long(bytes.fromhex(''))

p = bytes_to_long(bytes.fromhex('8d28ff88e23fdebf2dcc099433b7b08bfa56110a361c37a3a2fd2851e455b851db82f64292be8fe5cc6604861ad7d688d491d601a0bdc93564ff03811a94d4ef522204321a4153cd99821919e6971e2c27e3ff87e251118cf22f8f2be33013c8d6fbc839fa3f19e5d10004288ed5983449e2f94c7921973fe1ff465e5b5be173'))
q = bytes_to_long(bytes.fromhex('b7a70b639878d07ca0fc005d67e290a9d79a495e406f8cefded44c33075df5e94f4f42923c452f5587b3208e46dfd38ded74315a64a07dd97674147e00a764fa67e5866a9243a3e8f03172ad2c75614699a75897ee288bea5e1bdac3c6ffdf2e4c2144fead473ddf414e3c3000ddc81be1d6c0eade5ea7e6b6616e93a1d5b8cf'))




e = 0x10001
n = p * q

m = math.lcm(p - 1, q - 1)
d = pow(e, -1, m)

print(long_to_bytes(pow(c , d , n )))

```
flag : picoCTF{376ebfe7}
